resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103052</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103052</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202719</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Trial of Hamlet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Versuch des Dörfchens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'épreuve de la hameau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A experimentação do hamlet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La prova del piccolo villaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δίκη Αμλετ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ensayo de la aldea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students have the chance to research courtroom procedure to try Hamlet for the murder of Polonius. Then, with some students in the roles of characters from the play, the class will conduct the trial of Shakespeare's most famous anti-hero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion haben Kursteilnehmer die 
Wahrscheinlichkeit, Gerichtssaalprozedur zu erforschen, um Dörfchen 
für den Mord an Polonius zu versuchen. Dann mit einigen 
Kursteilnehmern in den Rollen der Zeichen vom Spiel, leitet die 
Kategorie den Versuch von Shakespeares berühmtestem Anti-hero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants ont la chance de 
rechercher le procédé de auditoire de tribunal pour essayer la 
hameau pour le meurtre de Polonius. Puis, avec quelques 
étudiants dans les rôles des caractères du jeu, la classe conduira 
l'épreuve de l'anti-hero le plus célèbre de Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes têm a possibilidade 
pesquisar o procedimento do courtroom para tentar o hamlet para o 
assassinato de Polonius. Então, com alguns estudantes nos 
papéis dos caráteres do jogo, a classe conduzirá a experimentação
do anti-hero o mais famoso de Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi hanno la probabilità 
ricercare la procedura di aula di tribunale per provare il piccolo 
villaggio per l'omicidio di Polonius. Allora, con alcuni allievi
nei ruoli dei caratteri dal gioco, il codice categoria condurrà la 
prova del anti-hero più famoso dello Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι σπουδαστές έχουν την πιθανότητα 
στη διαδικασία ερευνητικών δικαστηρίων να δοκιμάσουν Αμλετ για τη
δολοφονία Polonius. Κατόπιν, με μερικούς σπουδαστές στους
ρόλους των χαρακτήρων από το παιχνίδι, η κλάση θα 
πραγματοποιήσει τη δίκη του διασημότερου αντι-ήρωα Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes tienen la 
ocasión de investigar procedimiento de la sala de tribunal para intentar la
aldea para el asesinato de Polonius. Entonces, con algunos 
estudiantes en el papeles de caracteres del juego, la clase conducirá
el ensayo del anti-hero más famoso de Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

            <role>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
